2:
"God is very powerful; everyone should honor him very much;\q2 he causes everything to be peaceful high up in heaven, with no confusion at all.
\q1
3:
Can anyone count the angels who are in his army in heaven?\q2 Is there any person on whom his light does not shine?


\q1
4:
So how can God consider any person to be righteous?\q2 How can he accept any human being?
\q1
5:
Consider this: God does not even think that the full moon is bright,\q2 and he does not even accept the stars in the heavens as worthy of him.
\q1
6:
So what about humans?\q2 They are as insignificant as maggots.
\q2 God does not think more highly of people than he thinks of worms."
